response.original_title: Folk og røvere i Kardemomme by
response.overview: The three thieves Kasper, Jesper and Jonathan lives together with their always hungry lion in the little town of Kardemomme town, the home to a fair but kind police officer, and the strict Aunt Sofie.
response.title: Three Robbers and a Lion

titles.title: Le Lion et les trois brigands
A három rabló és a lusta oroszlán
